title: How to create Blazor WebAssembly Progressive Web Application with Azure Ad authentication
body:
I want to create a Blazor WebAssembly Progressive Web Application with Azure Ad authentication.

so i have downloaded visual studio blazor templets but when i tried to create the application the option of selecting the authentication has disable for work or school accounts

is there any to enable it

please refer the below screen

"The work or school accounts option is disable" is there any way to enable it
